description.value:
You cause memories of the target's resentment, regret, and other negative feelings to engorge its shadow until it grows large enough to swallow them whole. The target attempts a Will saving throw. The target is then immune to this spell for 1 minute.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target resists the spell before it's completely swallowed up, but shadowy tendrils cling to it, making the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target is swallowed by its own shadow until the beginning of your next turn. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, cannot experience or interact with the outside world, and cannot be targeted by any attacks or other effects.

Critical Failure As failure, except the target is swallowed for 1 minute.
